I would cure cancer first. Cancer is a devastating disease that affects millions of people worldwide. It causes immense pain and suffering to those who are diagnosed with it. Curing cancer would be a game-changer and would allow people to live longer and healthier lives.

I would cure mental illnesses. Mental illnesses such as depression, anxiety, and bipolar disorder affect millions of people and can cause immense suffering. Curing these illnesses would allow people to lead happier and more fulfilling lives.

I would cure heart disease. Heart disease is the leading cause of death globally and affects millions of people. Curing heart disease would save countless lives and improve the quality of life for those who suffer from it.

I would cure diabetes. Diabetes affects millions of people worldwide and can lead to serious health complications. Curing diabetes would allow people to live longer and healthier lives and prevent these complications.

I would cure Alzheimer's disease. Alzheimer's disease is a debilitating disease that affects millions of people worldwide. Curing Alzheimer's disease would allow people to retain their memories and live longer and healthier lives.
